corral.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a fairly small enclosed area where cattle, horses etc can be kept temporarily, especially in North America
corral.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to make animals move into a corral
corral.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: They corralled the cattle before loading them onto the truck.
corral.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to keep people in a particular area, especially in order to control them
corral.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Once at the airport, we were herded to the gate and corralled into a small room.
